TopicTitle: Looking for light-weight sea level Eve landers

Articles.Content:
As the title implies. I'm looking for lightweight Eve lander designs that are capable of taking off from explodium-level on Eve. Anything under 100t? Is anything under 60t possible? Perhaps lower than 50t? The lighter, the better. Post .craft files and/or imgur pictures of the lander. I'm looking primarily for stock craft, if that needs to be mentioned...

And just to clarify, I'm looking for the lightest mass of the craft only after launching from Eve. Landing equipment can obviously be included, but the weight of that is not counted. Also anything that can carry at least one kerbal. Preferrably not something where they are in command chairs (although, that it welcome, too).

Edited June 28, 2016 by Der Anfang
